item.title: A month bagpacking in Sikkim
item.description: Of all the India that Iâ€™ve seen, this was different. This was when first wave of Corona was over and things were at ease. So I left home to be in the remotest from where I can work peacefully. All those months in lockdown were really depressing and I felt to the core how it feels to be caged. Well I wanted to be free and so I took a one way ticket to Siliguri in January 2021.
